about_the_game:
Bring the magic of the holidays to your virtual hearth with the Christmas Decor DLC! Transform your cozy fireplace into a festive wonderland with these delightful additions:

  • Stockings: Hang them with care on the mantle, ready for Santa's arrival.

  • Garland: Add a touch of greenery to your fireplace for that classic holiday charm.

  • Cookies Plate: A sweet touch for your cozy scene—because Santa loves a snack!

  • Christmas Gift: A beautifully wrapped present to complete the festive look.

  • Toy Train: A fully functional miniature train that circles the fireplace, bringing a whimsical, nostalgic vibe.

Whether you're hosting a holiday party or enjoying a quiet night by the fire, this DLC is the perfect way to spread cheer and create a warm, inviting atmosphere. Light the fire, decorate the mantle, and enjoy the holiday spirit!
